input.sentences: i took a trip today to find out what kind of design i want on the pillars of my house .
some of the designs were very angled and hard to look at for long .
others were very floral and pretty pleasant on the eyes .
the company was trying to sell enough of the designs to cover entire walls .
when they 're put next to each other | it 's easy to tell which designs are the best .
